Configuration.Name: 20180419_L1=4 m L2=3m_center_apx12p5
Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 2200 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 150 config.guide = 'g7' config.apx = -98 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 91.607 config.beamcenterz = 95.904 config.drive()

Transmission.SetupScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(37, 100) # Drive attenuator to 240 driveAtt(240) # !!!

Scattering.SetupScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # !!! Warning: it is not recommended to manually drive the attenuator # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(37, 0) driveBsz(258)
